1607050.name: Regain Earth: First Strike - Fan Rewards
1607050.description:
Goal of the DLC

This DLC is my thanks to all Regain Earth pioneers who buy my game very early in Early Access and support the development of the of Regain Earth!

Free for Early Access buyers and through community events

You get this DLC for free when you buy Regain Earth in Early Access. You do not need to buy this DLC separately!
After the Early Access phase, this character skin pack can still be grabbed for free during community events!

DLC Content

The content so far includes two player character skins. They are not totally freaking new styles, but the skins clearly shows that you are something special. At the latest, after Regain Earth full release, a cool third character skin will be added.

Thank you

Thanks to every Regain Earth pioneer!
1607050.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
